tool_description: An API Get and show  sale discont  shopee and tiki by keyword in VietNam
name: Get Sale Shopee Tiki
title: Get Sale Shopee Tiki

api_list.name: Get Tiki Sale
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-sale-shopee-tiki.p.rapidapi.com/tiki-api/tivi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-sale-shopee-tiki.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
